name: Might & Magic: Heroes 6 - Pirates of the Savage Sea
name_original: Might & Magic: Heroes 6 - Pirates of the Savage Sea
description:
Might & Magic: Heroes 6 - Pirates of the Savage Sea is a strategy game developed by Limbic Entertainment. It came out on 12-07-2012. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Might & Magic: Heroes 6 - Pirates of the Savage Sea is available on PC.
